name: a.Red
description:
a.Red is a Pokémon fangame - or at least, it contains one. Choose your starter and set off on a wild adventure across Collector's Island to become the very best! Ignore any sensation of tremors, headaches, or temporary blindness. Everything is fine.

  • Features 50 Pokémon to find and collect, many of them in unique regional forms!
  • Try to survive Doomsday Mode, which requires you to complete the game within ten real-life hours!
  • Can you find the True Ending?

This game was made in a slightly unstable version of Pokémon Essentials, so save often, just in case.
